name: Waywords
description:
Waywords is a unique word game for those who love unscrambling anagrams! Challenge yourself by finding all the words for each puzzle, including the special max letter word which relates to the theme of the level. Earn stars as you guess more and more words to unlock new levels with increasingly challenging words. 

Explore more than ten beautiful levels with over a hundred and fifty challenging puzzles. Many more coming soon.
